CustomField.description: Email to be use as "From" while sending mails. You can use one of the organization wide emails configured at Your Name | Setup | Administration Setup | Email Administration | Organization-wide Addresses. If blank, current user's email will be used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Email to be use as "From" while sending mails. You can use one of the organization wide emails configured at Your Name | Setup | Administration Setup | Email Administration | Organization-wide Addresses. If blank, current user's email will be used.
CustomField.label: From Email Address
